Data.title: Thrips
Data.description: Small insects known as Thysanoptera that cause damage by feeding on plant tissues.

Data.title: Shot Hole Disease
Data.description: This condition shows up as small holes in the leaves, revealing the damage caused by the disease.

Data.title: Shield Bugs
Data.description: Also referred to as stink bugs, these pests often harm the plant by feeding on its sap.

Data.title: Scale Insects
Data.description: Tiny brown insects that suck plant sap, depriving your plant of vital nutrients.

Data.title: Peach Leaf Curl
Data.description: A disease caused by the fungus Taphrina deformans, leading to the curling of peach leaves.

Data.title: Snake
Data.description: Dracaena trifasciata is the most common type of sansevierias in indoor floriculture
